attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please help the disabled. I have MS, and like thousands of others, am virtually housebound. I cannot keep mobile enough to keep warm, and rely on heating my house. This is very expensive, which is hard when you are incapable of working. Pensioners4 get help with heating, many of whom are more able bodied than someone disabled. This is not fair. Please do something to help the disabled with heating costs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
